Hello

I'm Dan, I live in London, Great Britain and I make web apps.

You can find me on Twitter, LinkedIn and GitHub, and you can contact me using dan[at]danielhough.co.uk.

My most recent project is Scroutenise, and I spend my weekdays at Huddle where I'm a junior web developer.
